import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom" import { Table } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HistoryRow from "../components/historyrow" class PlanHistory extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {} } componentDidMount() { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/v1/users/${this.props.userId}`) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ storedUserDetails: data })) } render() { const { username } = this.props return ( username ?
